Review: After 6 seasons on the highly rated show Everybody Loves Hypnotoad he
makes his his silver screen debut! Everyone remembers the fantastic adventure
Hypnotoad began in the last season and this feature film is everything we had
hoped for. The excellent cinematography and lighting is as perfect as ever and
it will be no suprise if Hypnotoad Saves Xmas is nominated for best actor,
best director, and all the rest. This is a film for the ages.

Plot: The Hypnotoad has returned from England after dining with the Royal
Family (Season 6, episodes 4-10), and his life is just starting to get back to
normal. Unbeknownst to him, the crown prince upon hearing his tales of America
has left home and took a plane to New New York and finds himself lost in the
city. It&#039;s December 28th, and the Royal Family contacts Hypnotoad in
desperation and Hypnotoad agrees to scour the city and find the lost son before
Santa comes to town. As the final hours approach, Hypnotoad must take on the
Dark One in a final showdown to defend the crown and save Xmas for England.
